description: Light and packable reinforcement jacket for days when your activity level isn’t enough to keep you warm. Perfect as a warm mid layer under a shell jacket. Comfortable hood and otherwise simple design to keep weight down. Light, strong and windproof with PFC-free impregnation. 100% recycled polyester. Padded with G-Loft Supreme. Warms even in damp conditions. Padding made from 100% recycled polyester. Comfortable hood with elastic edging. Two-way zipper at the front. Two zippered hand pockets. Elastic edging at sleeve cuffs and hem. Easy-grip zipper pullers.
name: Bergtagen Lite Insulation Jacket - Mens
